h4.p: [21] brahmā ^a^T2.0405^ea^ ^a^M2.0299^ea^ ^a^V2.0287^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ca lokādhipatī sahampatī {sahampati (syā0 kaṃ0)}, katañjalī anadhivaraṃ ayācatha.
[21] ``na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ kīdisako naruttamo.
[22] iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca kīdisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa kīdisaṃ..
[21] ``na ^a^T2.0406^ea^ hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo.
[22] iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca edisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa edisaṃ..
[21] bhummā mahārājikā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā ca devā tusitā ca nimmitā.
[22] paranimmitā yepi ca brahmakāyikā, ānanditā vipulamakaṃsu ghosaṃ..
[21] obhāsitā ^a^P0.0002^ea^ ca pathavī sadevakā, puthū ca lokantarikā asaṃvutā.
[22] tamo ca tibbo vihato tadā ahu, disvāna accherakaṃ pāṭihīraṃ..
[22] imasmiṃ ^a^T2.0407^ea^ loke parasmiñcobhayasmiṃ {parasmiṃ cūbhaye (syā0 kaṃ0)}, adho ca uddhaṃ tiriyañca vitthataṃ..
[21] sattuttamo anadhivaro vināyako, satthā ahū devamanussapūjito.
[21] so yācito devavarena cakkhumā, atthaṃ samekkhitvā tadā naruttamo.
[22] caṅkamaṃ {caṅkamaṃ tattha (sī0)} māpayi lokanāyako, suniṭṭhitaṃ sabbaratananimmitaṃ..
[21] iddhī ca ādesanānusāsanī, tipāṭihīre bhagavā vasī ahu.
[21] tāvatiṃsā ^a^V2.0289^ea^ ca yāmā ca, tusitā cāpi devatā.
[21] sadevagandhabbamanussarakkhasā, nāgā supaṇṇā atha vāpi kinnarā.
[21] ābhassarā ^a^T2.0409^ea^ subhakiṇhā, vehapphalā akaniṭṭhā ca devatā.
[21] muñcanti pupphaṃ pana pañcavaṇṇikaṃ, mandāravaṃ candanacuṇṇamissitaṃ.
[22] bhamenti celāni ca ambare tadā, ``aho jino lokahitānukampako..
[21] ``tuvaṃ satthā ca ketū ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ.
[22] parāyano patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo {dipaduttamo (sī0 syā0)}..
[21] saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi ḍiṇḍimā {ḍeṇḍimā (sī0)} bahū.
[21] abbhuto ^a^V2.0290^ea^ vata no ajja, uppajji lomahaṃsano.
[21] buddhoti tesaṃ sutvāna, pīti uppajji tāvade.
[21] hiṅkārā sādhukārā ca {hiṅkāraṃ sādhukārañca (sī0 syā0)}, ukkuṭṭhi sampahaṃsanaṃ {sampasādanaṃ (sī0), sampanādanaṃ (syā0)}.
[22] pajā ca vividhā gagane, vattenti pañjalīkatā..
[21] gāyanti seḷenti ca vādayanti ca, bhujāni pothenti ca naccayanti ca.
[22] muñcanti pupphaṃ pana pañcavaṇṇikaṃ, mandāravaṃ candanacuṇṇamissitaṃ..
[21] ``ye keci loke vandaneyyā, vandanaṃ arahanti ye.
[22] sabbaseṭṭho mahāvīra, sadiso te na vijjati..
[22] amhepi tattha gantvāna, vandissāma mayaṃ jinaṃ..
[21] ukkāsitañca khipitaṃ {ukkāsitañca khipitañca (syā0 aṭṭha0)}, ajjhupekkhiya subbatā.
[22] nabhe accuggataṃ dhīraṃ, candaṃva gagane yathā..
[22] isi mantāniyā putto, puṇṇo nāmāti vissuto..
[21] ``cattāro ^a^M2.0305^ea^ te asaṅkheyyā, koṭi yesaṃ na nāyati.
[22] buddhañāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ, na sakkā ete vijānituṃ..
[21] ```kālo kho te {kālo deva (sī0), kāloyaṃ te (syā0 ka0)} mahāvīra, uppajja mātukucchiyaṃ.
[22] obhāso ca mahā āsi, accheraṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ''..
[21] bhagavā tamhi {bhagavā ca tamhi (sī0 syā0 ka0)} samaye, lokajeṭṭho narāsabho.
[22] antarā na nivatteti, catuhatthe caṅkame yathā..
[22] kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā..
[21] kappe ^a^T2.0416^ea^ ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye.
[22] lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato..
[21] ``atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye.
[22] na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so..
[22] na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe..
[22] na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so..
[22] na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase..
[22] na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake..
[22] na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake..
[22] chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ..
[21] te me puṭṭhā viyākaṃsu, ``buddho loke anuttaro.
[21] buddhotivacanaṃ {buddhoti mama (sī0 syā0 ka0)} sutvāna, pīti uppajji tāvade.
[22] ``idha ^a^P0.0009^ea^ bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā..
[21] adaṃsu ^a^M2.0310^ea^ te mamokāsaṃ, sodhetuṃ añjasaṃ tadā.
[22] buddho buddhoti cintento, maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā..
[21] devā manusse passanti, manussāpi ca devatā.
[21] devā dibbehi turiyehi, manussā mānusehi ca {mānussakehi ca mānusakehi ca (syā0 ka0)}.
[22] mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissati''..
[21] pathaviyaṃ nipannassa, evaṃ me āsi cetaso.
[22] pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo..
[27] kolito ^a^T2.0423^ea^ upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā.
[22] āmoditā naramarū, buddhabījaṃ kira {buddhabījaṅkuro (sī0 syā0)} ayaṃ..
[21] ye tatthāsuṃ jinaputtā, padakkhiṇamakaṃsu {sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṃsu (syā0 ka0)} maṃ.
[22] devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ..
[22] pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja pupphitā {pupphitāni (aṭṭha0)} sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ```latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade.
[22] tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ```mānussakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade.
[22] tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] visākhā candimā yuttā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ```na honti aratī sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade.
[22] tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tāni ^a^P0.0012^ea^ ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ```rāgo tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassati.
[22] tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] sopajja vāyati gandho, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[22] tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ```kuṭṭā ^a^T2.0427^ea^ {kuḍḍā (sī0)} kavāṭā selā ca, na hontāvaraṇā tadā.
[21] ```cutī ca upapatti ca, khaṇe tasmiṃ na vijjati.
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[21] ``yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ.
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ..
[22] uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā''..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[21] ``yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adho kato.
[22] vamate vudakaṃ nissesaṃ, na tattha parirakkhati..
[22] dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adho kato..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ..
[22] parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhiṃ..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] na tattha rāgaṃ janesi, muttiṃyeva gavesati..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkama hi vīthito.
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] mettāya asamo hohi, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi..
[21] ``imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya.
[22] tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha''..
[22] telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī..
[22] pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā seti bhūmiyaṃ..
[22] sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma''..
[21] buddhassa vacanaṃ sutvā, mano nibbāyi tāvade.
[21] dibbaṃ mānusakaṃ pupphaṃ, devā mānusakā ubho.
[21] vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho.
[22] mā te bhavantvantarāyā {bhavatvantarāyo (sī0 syā0)}, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ..
[21] ``yathā ye keci sambuddhā, pūrayuṃ dasa pāramī.
[22] tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, pūraya dasa pāramī..
[22] tatheva lokā muñcitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ..
[21] tehi thutappasattho so, dasa dhamme samādiya.
[22] te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadāti..
[22] kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ..
[22] kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā..
[21] vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ, iddhaṃ phītaṃ ahū tadā.
[21] ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ.
[21] nagaraṃ rammavatī nāma, sudevo nāma khattiyo.
[21] dasavassasahassāni ^a^P0.0018^ea^, agāraṃ ajjha so vasi {ajjhāvasī jino (syā0 ka0)}.
[22] haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, tayo pāsādamuttamā..
[22] padumā nāma sā nārī, usabhakkhandho atrajo..
[21] sumaṅgalo ^a^M2.0323^ea^ ca tisso ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvakā.
[21] nandā ^a^T2.0438^ea^ ceva sunandā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni.
[22] sabbaṃ tamantarahitaṃ {samantarahitaṃ (sī0 syā0 ka0)}, nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārā {sabbasaṅkhārāti (sabbattha)}..
[21] ahaṃ tena samayena, vijitāvī nāma khattiyo.
[21] sopi maṃ buddho byākāsi, koṇḍañño lokanāyako.
[22] pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo..
[21] tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, bhiyyo cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
[27] tameva atthaṃ sādhento, mahārajjaṃ jine adaṃ.
[21] nagaraṃ rammavatī nāma, sunando nāma khattiyo.
[21] dasavassasahassāni, agāraṃ ajjha so vasi {agāramajjhe ca so vasi (syā0)}.
[22] suci suruci subho ca, tayo pāsādamuttamā..
[21] bhaddo ceva subhaddo ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvakā.
[21] tissā ^a^M2.0326^ea^ ca upatissā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[21] soṇo ca upasoṇo ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhakā.
[22] nandā ceva sirīmā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā..
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] sā ca atuliyā jinassa iddhi, ñāṇaparibhāvito ca samādhi.
[22] te te saccarasaṃ pītvā, vinodenti mahātamaṃ..
[22] sabbepi te niravasesā, ahesuṃ ehi bhikkhukā..
[21] ahaṃ tena samayena, surucī nāma brāhmaṇo.
[21] sopi maṃ buddho byākāsi, maṅgalo dvipaduttamo.
[21] tassāpi vacanaṃ sutvā, bhiyyo cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
[22] buddhe datvāna maṃ gehaṃ, pabbajiṃ tassa santike..
[21] uttaraṃ ^a^M2.0328^ea^ nāma nagaraṃ, uttaro nāma khattiyo.
[22] yasavatī nāma nārī, sīvalo nāma atrajo..
[21] brahmunā yācito santo, maṅgalo nāma nāyako.
[21] sīvalā ca asokā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[21] nando ceva visākho ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhakā.
[22] anulā ceva sutanā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā..
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] yathāpi sāgare ūmī, na sakkā tā gaṇetuye.
[22] tatheva sāvakā tassa, na sakkā te gaṇetuye..
[22] na ^a^P0.0023^ea^ tassa sāsane atthi, sakilesamaraṇaṃ {saṃkilesamaraṇaṃ (sī0)} tadā..
[21] uyyāne vassare nāma, buddho nibbāyi maṅgalo.
[21] tadā amatabheriṃ so, āhanī mekhale pure.
[22] te te ime guṇavare, ādiyanti yathā sukhaṃ..
[21] yamhi kāle mahāvīro, ovadī titthiye gaṇe.
[21] yadā devā manussā ca, samaggā ekamānasā.
[21] sopi maṃ buddho byākāsi, sumano lokanāyako.
[21] tassāpi vacanaṃ sutvā, bhiyyo cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
[21] nagaraṃ mekhalaṃ nāma {mekhalaṃ nāma nagaraṃ (sī0 syā0)}, sudatto nāma khattiyo.
[22] cando sucando vaṭaṃso ca, tayo pāsādamuttamā..
[22] vaṭaṃsikā nāma nārī, anūpamo nāma atrajo..
[21] soṇā ca upasoṇā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[21] varuṇo ceva saraṇo ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhakā.
[22] cālā ca upacālā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā..
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] te ^a^T2.0453^ea^ ca khīṇāsavā bhikkhū, so ca buddho asādiso.
[21] tañca ñāṇaṃ atuliyaṃ, tāni ca atulāni ratanāni.
[21] yadā arindamaṃ rājaṃ {rājānaṃ (ka0)}, vinesi revato muni.
[21] yopi {yo so (syā0 kaṃ0 ka0)} paññāya asamo, tassa cakkānuvattako.
[22] so tadā byādhito āsi, patto jīvitasaṃsayaṃ..
[21] tassa gilānapucchāya, ye tadā upagatā munī.
[21] ahaṃ tena samayena, atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo.
[22] upagantvā revataṃ buddhaṃ, saraṇaṃ tassa gañchahaṃ..
[21] sopi ^a^P0.0026^ea^ maṃ buddho byākāsi, revato lokanāyako.
[21] tassāpi vacanaṃ sutvā, bhiyyo cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
[22] āharissāmi taṃ dhammaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ abhipatthitaṃ..
[21] nagaraṃ ^a^M2.0333^ea^ sudhaññavatī nāma {sudhammakaṃ nāma (sī0), sudhaññakaṃ nāma (syā0)}, vipulo nāma khattiyo.
[21] cha ^a^V2.0319^ea^ ca vassasahassāni {chabbassasahassāni (sī0 syā0)}, agāraṃ ajjha so vasi.
[22] sudassanā nāma nārī, varuṇo nāma atrajo..
[21] bhaddā ceva subhaddā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[22] divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, samantā pharati yojanaṃ..
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] so ca kāyo ratananibho, so ca dhammo asādiso.
[21] revato ^a^M2.0334^ea^ yasadharo buddho, nibbuto so mahāpure.
[21] yāva heṭṭhā avīcito, bhavaggā cāpi uddhato.
[21] tassa yāgaṃ pakittento, dhammaṃ desesi cakkhumā.
[21] uggato nāma so rājā, dānaṃ deti naruttame.
[21] ahaṃ tena samayena, sujāto nāma brāhmaṇo.
[21] sopi maṃ buddho byākāsi, sobhito lokanāyako.
[21] sudhammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ, sudhammo nāma khattiyo.
[22] maṇilā {makhilā (aṭṭha0), samaṅgī (sī0), makilā (syā0 kaṃ0)} nāma sā nārī, sīho nāmāsi atrajo..
[21] asamo ca sunetto ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvakā.
[21] nakulā ca sujātā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[22] bujjhamāno ca so buddho, nāgamūle abujjhatha..
[21] rammo ceva sudatto ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhakā.
[22] nakulā ceva cittā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā..
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[21] so ^a^V2.0322^ea^ ca buddho asamasamo, tepi sāvakā balappattā.
[21] so chetvā bandhanaṃ sabbaṃ, viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhave.
[21] dassanenapi taṃ buddhaṃ, tositā honti pāṇino.
[22] byāharantaṃ giraṃ sutvā, amataṃ pāpuṇanti te..
[21] dhammābhisamayo ^a^T2.0463^ea^ tassa, iddho phīto tadā ahu.
[21] sannipātā tayo āsuṃ, tassāpi ca mahesino.
[21] ahaṃ tena samayena, yakkho āsiṃ mahiddhiko.
[21] sopi maṃ tadā byākāsi, visuddhanayano muni.
[21] nagaraṃ ^a^P0.0030^ea^ candavatī nāma, yasavā nāma khattiyo.
[22] sirimā nāma sā nārī, upavāṇo nāma atrajo..
[22] vatti cakkaṃ mahāvīro, uyyāne so sudassane {sudassanuyyānamuttame (syā0 kaṃ0)}..
[21] nisabho ca anomo ca {asoko ca (sī0)}, ahesuṃ aggasāvakā.
[21] sundarī ca sumanā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā.
[22] uppalā ceva padumā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā..
